attributes.action: Allow rural development on B and unclassified road frontages with a crops, fish and fowl only agricultural tie
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To decentralise our cities and encourage self sufficiency and British Agriculture, introduce legislation to allow farmers to sell 4.54 acre (1 hectare) plots at a standardised cost of 4 x the local average agricultural land cost.
A permanent agricultural tie, crops, fish and fowl only, will apply.
A single property will be allowed, maximum footprint 1% of plot, maximum height 20ft (6.1m), set back from the road frontage by a minimum of 30 yards (27m).
All properties will have their own renewable energy supplies, rainwater catchment systems and sewage treatment/disposal facilities.
The plots should be not less than 109 yards (100 metres) frontage to allow for safe vehicular access onto the B or unclassified road.
All existing public rights of way will not be encompassed within a plot.
